parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index number of the selected object

title: ISelectionMgr.SetCallout
description: Adds a callout to the currently selected object.
signature:
System.Boolean SetCallout( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   Callout
PCallout
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index number of the selected object

returns: True if the callout is added to the selected object, false if not
remarks:
Use
ISelectionMgr::CreateCallout2
to set the properties of the callout. Then use ISelectionMgr::SetCallout to add the callout to an already selected object.
